# leftEarSensitivity

**Instance Property**

The sensitivity of the left ear.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var leftEarSensitivity: HKQuantity? { get }
```

## Discussion

This object uses [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit/decibelHearingLevel()] units to measure sensitivity in attenuated dB from a baseline of 0 dB.

## Accessing Data

- **frequency**: The frequency tested in the hearing test.
- **rightEarSensitivity**: The sensitivity of the right ear.
